issues: Some text may blend with the background due to similar tones.
One icon appears left-aligned; should be right-aligned for consistency.
Some elements appear closely spaced, which might be visually overwhelming.

slides.summary: The slide is mostly well-designed but has issues with text visibility and some spacing concerns.
recommendations: Enhance contrast for more readability on text.
Ensure all icons are consistently right-aligned.
Adjust spacing between elements for better visual flow.
